headline.main: CLARITY HELD NEED ON POST-WAR AIMS; New Zealand Minister Asserts Sincerity of Atlantic Charter Must Be Established

lead_paragraph: Walter Nash, New Zealand's Minister to the United States, urged yesterday immediate creation of a "post-war reconstruction council" by the United Nations to determine and to tell the world just how the Atlantic Charter would be put into practice.
abstract: NZ Min Nash urges United Nations reconstruction council formation to test Atlantic Charter practicability
snippet: Walter Nash, New Zealand's Minister to the United States, urged yesterday immediate creation of a "post-war reconstruction council" by the United Nations to determine and to tell the world just how the Atlantic Charter would be put into practice....
